location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Philip Henry Bridges, Commander of HM Sloop Challenger, Bushire Roads to William Bruce, Honourable Company's Resident at Bushire

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The first word of each line of the bottom half of the letter has been obscured owing to insect damage.

mods.abstract: The letter is setting out ways in which copies of his instructions for the conduct of ships in the Persian Gulf may be disseminated once the Challengerleaves the region.
